Name: Lovers Anonymous Rehab for Romantics
About the game: NOT A 18+ ADULT GAME! Just deals with some 18+ themes. Ever feel like you're addicted to romance? Love? If you do, come join us at Lover's Anonymous where a heartbreak can become a full-fledged romance. Featuring ~25k words (~1-3 hours of playtime) 3 CGs 3 backstories 2 character routes and 4 endings Partial Voice acting A poly route :3 Be gay, do crime Warnings Cursing Suggestive content Depressing events Death REALLY, really intense heavy, raw feelings Uncomfortable sexual advances Crime Alcohol abuse 1 m*n Capatilism :*((
